channel.title: Need help on food
channel.description: how can i put a item soo i can eat it and heal me 80 hp or 50 idk please help this is a example:: i eat a herb and give me 80 hp

item.title: Need help on food
item.dc:creator: @shamu308 shamu308
item.description:
@shamu308 wrote:

[quote=“mag3 0wner, post:2, topic:317661”]This is for 317’s

case ####: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.setAnimation(0x33D); c.sM("You eat the (ITEM NAME)."); if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){ c.sM("It heals some health."); } c.deleteItem(####, slot, 1); c.currentHealth += 80;//change this to whatever you want it to heal if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]) c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]; c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016); break;

Change the ####'s to whatever the id of the food is.[/quote]
where i suppose to put it what file?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on food
item.dc:creator: @mag3_0wner mag3 0wner
item.description:
@mag3_0wner wrote:

This is for 317’s

case ####: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.setAnimation(0x33D); c.sM("You eat the (ITEM NAME)."); if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){ c.sM("It heals some health."); } c.deleteItem(####, slot, 1); c.currentHealth += 80;//change this to whatever you want it to heal if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]) c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]; c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016); break;

Change the ####'s to whatever the id of the food is.
